parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the instrument cluster can render many safety features, including the backup camera, inoperable, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The instrument cluster screen turns off randomly while driving
displays critical information such as tire pressure
warning messages
and lights
speed
etc.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Clutch and Accelerator Issues in Snow Mode
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch and accelerator in Snow Mode can cause the vehicle to lose power, making it difficult to accelerate, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The accelerator does not respond to input
the vehicle does not want to move
the vehicle reduces speed to 15 mph
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The cracking and shattering of the windshield can cause visibility issues, impede the driver's view, and increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The windshield cracks or shatters spontaneously
without any apparent cause
cracks start from the seal and move out
cracks impede visibility and interrupt heads-up display.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The battery drain issue can cause the vehicle to be unable to start, which can leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The battery is completely dead after a short period of non-use
despite no apparent cause.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The shattering of the sunroof can cause injury to occupants, impede visibility, and increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The sunroof glass shatters suddenly
without any apparent cause
shards of glass scatter everywhere.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the AC condenser can cause the air conditioning system to malfunction, which can lead to discomfort and distraction while driving.
symptoms: The AC condenser is not working
Kia blames it on a rock hitting it
but many owners have reported the same issue.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of Snow Mode can cause the vehicle to lose acceleration, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle loses acceleration after coming to a stop and demanding acceleration again
the vehicle will roll using idle power but there is no increase to the RPM's
the vehicle has to be stopped and moved to ECO mode for the vehicle to go back to working.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the instrument cluster can cause the driver to lose critical information, such as speed, fuel level, and safety alerts, leading to accidents or safety risks.
symptoms: The instrument cluster display goes black
no information is displayed
the display flashes blank then dark gray
the blinkers fail to operate
the driver is unable to see critical information.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the vehicle to lose power, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle loses power
the engine control system message is displayed
the battery warning light and check engine light are displayed
the display panel shows every error message
the vehicle loses power steering.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of safety features, such as forward collision avoidance and lane departure warning, can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The forward collision avoidance system fails to activate
the lane departure warning system fails to operate
the blind spot warning system fails to operate.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the tow hitch harness can cause fires, leading to safety risks.
symptoms: The tow hitch harness is faulty
the vehicle is recalled for the tow hitch harness issue
the dealer is unable to provide a solution.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to refuse to accelerate, leading to accidents or safety risks.
symptoms: The vehicle refuses to accelerate
the transmission has trouble shifting
the vehicle jumps and makes a loud noise when it finally accelerates.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and unexpected cracking or shattering of the windshield can cause reduced visibility, increased risk of accidents, and potential harm to occupants.
symptoms: Windshield chips or cracks suddenly appear
often without any apparent impact or debris; cracks spread rapidly
making it difficult or impossible to repair; windshields shatter or crack extensively
compromising visibility and safety.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The appearance of a dark spot or shadow on the windshield can cause reduced visibility, especially at night or in low-light conditions, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: A dark spot or shadow appears on the windshield
typically when driving at night or in low-light conditions
reducing visibility and creating a safety hazard.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Loss of Acceleration in Snow Mode
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The loss of acceleration in Snow Mode can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded, especially when turning or merging into traffic.
symptoms: The vehicle fails to accelerate or loses power when pressing the accelerator pedal
feels like the car is stuck in neutral
slow acceleration
or no acceleration at all.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch and transmission system can cause the vehicle to stall or lose power, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
the clutch pedal sticks to the floor
the vehicle fails to shift into gear
rough gear shifting
and jerky acceleration.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the horn can lead to accidents or injuries, especially in emergency situations.
symptoms: The horn fails to work
both low and high horn need to be replaced.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear differential can cause wheel slippage, loss of traction, and accidents.
symptoms: Loud sounds coming from the rear
constant wheel slippage
and replacement of the rear differential did not fix the issue.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The lack of warning sounds can lead to accidents or injuries, especially when parking or reversing.
symptoms: No warning sounds when getting close to a car in front while parking.
